text: Walid Mohi Edine al Muallem (; 13 January 1941 – 16 November 2020) was a Syrian politician. He was a member of the Ba'ath Party. He was Foreign Minister from 2006 to 2020 and as Deputy Prime Minister from 2012 to 2020. Muallem was born in Damascus, Syria. Muallem died on 16 November 2020 in Damascus from heart disease at the age of 79.Syria's veteran foreign minister Walid Moalem dies - state TVرئاسة مجلس الوزراء ووزارة الخارجية والمغتربين تنعيان نائب رئيس مجلس الوزراء وزير الخارجية والمغتربين وليد المعلم ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ambassadors Category:Asian diplomats Category:Syrian politicians
title: Walid Muallem
